title: Podcast Streaming Feature
requirement:
Provide functionality for streaming thousands of podcasts with options to browse categories, search by topics/hosts, and save preferences for future listening.  
#### Screens:  
* Podcast Home: Show curated podcast categories.  
* Search Results: Display user-specific search results based on host/topic/genre.  
#### Personas:  
* Podcast Lover: Searches for niche or detailed content in specific categories.  
* Casual Explorer: Browses general podcast recommendations without precise intent.
